alert.note: Alert for Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 18 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN...NORTHWESTERN WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHEASTERN KEARNEY COUNTIES... At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Campbell, or 32 miles southwest of Hastings, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Campbell around 635 PM CDT. Bladen around 645 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 650 PM CDT. Holstein around 655 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
